mapper.insert: INSERT INTO care_children ( therapist_id, center_id, child_name, protector_number, profile_image, disability_type, age ) VALUES ( #{therapistId}, #{centerId}, #{childName}, #{protectorNumber}, #{profileImage}, #{disabilityType}, #{age} )
mapper.select: SELECT cc.child_id AS childId, cc.child_name AS childName, cc.protector_number AS protectorNumber, cc.age, cc.disability_type AS disabilityType, c.center_name AS centerName FROM care_children cc JOIN care_center c ON cc.center_id = c.center_id WHERE cc.therapist_id = #{therapistId}

SELECT cc.child_id AS childId, cc.child_name AS childName, cc.protector_number AS protectorNumber, cc.age, cc.disability_type AS disabilityType, c.center_name AS centerName FROM care_children cc JOIN care_center c ON cc.center_id = c.center_id WHERE cc.therapist_id = #{therapistId} AND cc.child_name = #{childName}

SELECT c.center_name AS centerName, cc.child_name AS childName, cc.protector_number AS protectorNumber, cc.profile_image AS profileImage, cc.disability_type AS disabilityType, cc.age AS age FROM care_children cc JOIN care_center c ON cc.center_id = c.center_id WHERE cc.child_id = #{childId}
SELECT t.treatment_date, t.start_time, t.end_time, t.words, t.sentence, t.conversation FROM treatment t WHERE t.child_id = #{childId} ORDER BY t.treatment_date DESC, t.start_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE care_children SET center_id = #{child.centerId}, child_name = #{child.childName}, protector_number = #{child.protectorNumber}, profile_image = #{child.profileImage}, disability_type = #{child.disabilityType}, age = #{child.age} WHERE child_id = #{child.childId}
